**Fun Fact:** My 1st job out of college was being QA! My 1st paid app as a developer was to automate my QA job! After I was done, I added what amounted to be a read.me: **"I'm sorry, but this is my 1st PAID application... You should probably rewrite it!"** I'm told that application was around for years before finally being retired!
